description:
To export the video to YouTube, follow these steps:

1. Open the video on the video player page
2. You'll find 'YouTube' in the 'Export videos to' section. Click on it.
3. You will see a pop-up to choose the channel to which you want to export your videos. Otherwise, make sure pop-up windows are allowed.
4. Select an account to proceed with the export.
5. As the export completes, the Youtube button will change its color to Red with a check mark next to it. Click on it to see the video exported on Youtube.


(Authentication is required if you are not connected to YouTube, or else upload permission will not be provided)
title: How to export video to YouTube
description_text: To export the video to YouTube, follow these steps:  1. Open the video on the video player page 2. You'll find 'YouTube' in the 'Export videos to' section. Click on it. 3. You will see a pop-up to choose the channel to which you want to export your videos. Otherwise, make sure pop-up windows are allowed. 4. Select an account to proceed with the export. 5. As the export completes, the Youtube button will change its color to Red with a check mark next to it. Click on it to see the video exported on Youtube.     (Authentication is required if you are not connected to YouTube, or else upload permission will not be provided)

description:
At times, you might want to create a new video project with the input requirements similar to previous project. At such circumstance, you can simply make a copy of the video project. To make a copy, follow these easy steps:


1. Click on 'My Videos' link in the menu tab.


2. Find the video you would like to copy.

3. Click on the menu icon [☰] located in the bottom-right corner of the video thumbnail.



4. Select on 'Edit Video' to create a copy the video.
title: How do I make a copy of a video project?
description_text: At times, you might want to create a new video project with the input requirements similar to previous project. At such circumstance, you can simply make a copy of the video project. To make a copy, follow these easy steps:     1. Click on 'My Videos' link in the menu tab.      2. Find the video you would like to copy.  3. Click on the menu icon [☰] located in the bottom-right corner of the video thumbnail.         4. Select on 'Edit Video' to create a copy the video.

description:
Using Picovico, you can convert photos into videos in following easy steps:

  • Sign up for an account or login via your Facebook/google+ account

  • Verify email and log in 

  • Select a style

  • Add photos, video clips and text slides under a particular music

  • Click the ‘Create’ button to make a video

  • Personalize the video content and finalize


You can leave your freshly minted video of awesomeness on site for public viewing or share it on Facebook or YouTube or embed it on your website or blog. You can also download and save a copy on your desktop.


Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to create a video with Picovico:
title: How do I get started?
description_text:
Using Picovico, you can convert photos into videos in following easy steps:  
  Sign up for an account or login via your Facebook/google+ account  
  Verify email and log in   
  Select a style  
  Add photos, video clips and text slides under a particular music  
  Click the ‘Create’ button to make a video  
 Personalize the video content and finalize 
     You can leave your freshly minted video of awesomeness on site for public viewing or share it on Facebook or YouTube or embed it on your website or blog. You can also download and save a copy on your desktop.   Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to create a video with Picovico:

description:
To add new text slides to your video, click on the add icon or 'Add text' button available in step to add the media, as shown below:



Afterwards, a window will pop open where you will be able to add a 50-character title and 50-character text. 



To add captions to the uploaded photos, click on 'Add Caption' under the photo or simply double click on the photo to which you would like to caption. A box will appear allowing you to add 50 character caption.
title: How do I add text slides to my video?
description_text: To add new text slides to your video, click on the add icon or 'Add text' button available in step to add the media, as shown below:         Afterwards, a window will pop open where you will be able to add a 50-character title and 50-character text.          To add captions to the uploaded photos, click on 'Add Caption' under the photo or simply double click on the photo to which you would like to caption. A box will appear allowing you to add 50 character caption.

description:
There are basically 3 ways to add pictures and video clips.

  • Directly upload from your device.

  • From previous uploads (if any).

  • From your Facebook gallery.



Just click on the add button or simply select the button to add photos and you will get the following screen:
title: How do I add video clips to my video?
description_text:
There are basically 3 ways to add pictures and video clips.  
  Directly upload from your device.  
  From previous uploads (if any).  
  From your Facebook gallery.  
        Just click on the add button or simply select the button to add photos and you will get the following screen:

description:
To change the music of your video, you can either upload your own music or choose from our collection of music. Just click on the button to 'Change Music' and you will be redirected to the Picovico Music Library.




UPLOADING YOUR OWN MUSIC:


To upload your music, simply click on 'Upload' button and select your favorite song on your computer. Your music files must not be greater than 8 MB if you're a standard user, 15 MB if you're a premium user and 25MB if you're on a pro plan. The uploaded music will be listed on top of the list under 'My Music' category as shown below:



Before uploading, make sure you have proper rights to use the music.


There's no need to check for copyright issues when you use music from Picovico's music collections as all songs are licensed for use. 


Please go through this video for a walk-through of the change music feature:
title: How do I change the music of my video?
description_text:
To change the music of your video, you can either upload your own music or choose from our collection of music. Just click on the button to 'Change Music' and you will be redirected to the Picovico Music Library.            UPLOADING YOUR OWN MUSIC:     To upload your music, simply click on 'Upload' button and select your favorite song on your computer. Your music files must not be greater than 8 MB if you're a standard user, 15 MB if you're a premium user and 25MB if you're on a pro plan. The uploaded music will be listed on top of the list under 'My Music' category as shown below:         Before uploading, make sure you have proper rights to use the music.  
   
 There's no need to check for copyright issues when you use music from Picovico's music collections as all songs are licensed for use.  
   
Please go through this video for a walk-through of the change music feature:

description: Yes, you can make a video with no musical background. Just upload and use the audio file attached here.
title: How to make a video without soundtrack ?
description_text: Yes, you can make a video with no musical background. Just upload and use the audio file attached here.

description:
To create a video with multiple music, start with the same procedure for creating a video. Once you've added a set of photos for a particular music, proceed by selecting the button ‘Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music.




PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
title: How to make video with multiple soundtracks ?
description_text: To create a video with multiple music, start with the same procedure for creating a video. Once you've added a set of photos for a particular music, proceed by selecting the button ‘Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music.            PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.

description: Select the menu icon [☰] on the thumbnail of the video project you wish to edit and click the link to 'Edit Video'. Perform the desired changes and save it.
title: How do I edit a video?
description_text: Select the menu icon [☰] on the thumbnail of the video project you wish to edit and click the link to 'Edit Video'. Perform the desired changes and save it.

description:
To save video to your computer, you'll need to download it. To download a copy of your video, you'll have to start from the play page for your video. Once you're on the page, click on 'Download' from the bottom-left corner and get your video downloaded automatically in mp4 format. 


Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to save your video to your computer:


 



If you're not able to save it with the procedure, follow the following method:
title: How do I save my video to my computer?
description_text: To save video to your computer, you'll need to download it. To download a copy of your video, you'll have to start from the play page for your video. Once you're on the page, click on 'Download' from the bottom-left corner and get your video downloaded automatically in mp4 format.      Please go through this video for a walk-through of how to save your video to your computer:              If you're not able to save it with the procedure, follow the following method:
